fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone to suck up at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you suck up someone, they are killed, and their role in the graveyard will appear as "Warped".
- You will become the role of the player that you sucked up while retaining the following attributes.
- You and your target will have a one-on-one permanent chat.
- Your target will not be able to access dead chat.
- Your target is still in control of their night and day actions, but you will be the one to carry them out.
- You will chat with your faction's night chat if they have one.
- When you die, your role will be shown as [your new role] Kirby (e.g. Sheriff Kirby or Coven Leader Kirby). This does not apply if you die before you suck up a player.
- You may not suck yourself up you nincompoop.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Suck up a player and fulfill their win condition.
